p:
Adenosine deaminase (ADA), a kind of human enzyme, could interact with DPP4, therefore, ADA could compete with MERS-CoV as a natural antagonist when the virus attempts to bind to cells.
148 In addition, anti-DPP4 can play a similar role,
149 however, it is not practical to use this method in vivo because DPP4 has important functions in the regulation of several different signaling pathways.
150
